project_descr: Aceh Government Transformation Programme (AGTP). Addresses the urgent need to strengthen to strengthen the capacity of Aceh's provincial government

donor_name: INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION ACTING AS TRUSTEE FOR THE MULTI-DONOR TRUST FUND FOR ACEH AND NORTH SUMATRA
outputs.output_descr: Enhanced capacity of the provincial training & human resource agency (BKPP) to retain, manage and transfer to provincial and district government agencies the knowledge and skills required for successful transition and sustainable recovery

donor_name: INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION ACTING AS TRUSTEE FOR THE MULTI-DONOR TRUST FUND FOR ACEH AND NORTH SUMATRA
outputs.output_descr: The Project "Aceh Government Transformation Programme", to strengthen the capacity of Aceh’s provincial government, is effectively implemented, monitored, reported and audited.

donor_name: INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION ACTING AS TRUSTEE FOR THE MULTI-DONOR TRUST FUND FOR ACEH AND NORTH SUMATRA
outputs.output_descr: This will provide the Provincial Executive with the ability to coordinate and facilitate the transition through a demand-driven approach to key transition policy areas.

donor_name: INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION ACTING AS TRUSTEE FOR THE MULTI-DONOR TRUST FUND FOR ACEH AND NORTH SUMATRA
outputs.output_descr: Transfer of reconstruction and rehabilitation assets and enhance capacity of district governments to manage the reconstruction and rehablitation assets.

donor_name: INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATION ACTING AS TRUSTEE FOR THE MULTI-DONOR TRUST FUND FOR ACEH AND NORTH SUMATRA
